name: exploring Istanbul on Foot
description: The trip will be a one and a half hour to two hour walking trip from,Beyazit to Eminonu. We will visit the blue mosque, Hagir Sofia, Topkapli palace, basilica cistern, and the grand bazar(it is all on the same route). A little history will be given about each of the visits. We will have a meal at a traditional Turkish cafe at Eminonu. There is a ferry port at Eminou, we will have a look at the sea  and possibly take a 20 minute ferry across the sea to the Asian part of Istanbul(kadikoy or uskuddar)
